p: RAW264.7, LO 2, and HSC-T6 cells were seeded in 6-well plates, and then different concentrations of RTA–B were added to cells 2 h before LPS (100 ng/mL), TNF- α (20 ng/mL), or TGF- β (10 ng/mL) stimulation. After treatment for 24 h, cells were collected to extract protein for further western blot analysis.
